com.paymill.services
Class PaymentService

java.lang.Object
  com.paymill.services.PaymentService

public class PaymentService
extends Object

The PaymentService is used to list, create, edit, delete and update PAYMILL Payments.

Since:
3.0.0
Author:
Vassil Nikolov

Method Detail

list

public PaymillList<Payment> list()
This function returns a List of PAYMILL Payment objects.

Returns:
PaymillList which contains a List of PAYMILL Payments and their total count.

list

public PaymillList<Payment> list(Integer count,
                                 Integer offset)
This function returns a List of PAYMILL Payment objects, overriding the default count and offset.

Parameters:
count - Max Integer of returned objects in the PaymillList
offset - Integer to start from.
Returns:
PaymillList which contains a List of PAYMILL Payments and their total count.

list

public PaymillList<Payment> list(Payment.Filter filter,
                                 Payment.Order order)
This function returns a List of PAYMILL Payment objects. In which order this list is returned depends on the optional parameters. If null is given, no filter or order will be applied.

Parameters:
filter - Payment.Filter or null
order - Payment.Order or null
Returns:
PaymillList which contains a List of PAYMILL Payments and their total count.

list

public PaymillList<Payment> list(Payment.Filter filter,
                                 Payment.Order order,
                                 Integer count,
                                 Integer offset)
This function returns a List of PAYMILL Payment objects. In which order this list is returned depends on the optional parameters. If null is given, no filter or order will be applied, overriding the default count and offset.

Parameters:
filter - Payment.Filter or null
order - Payment.Order or null
count - Max Integer of returned objects in the PaymillList
offset - Integer to start from.
Returns:
PaymillList which contains a List of PAYMILL Payments and their total count.

get

public Payment get(Payment payment)
Returns and refresh data of a specific Payment.

Parameters:
payment - A Payment with Id.
Returns:
Refreshed instance of the given Payment.

get

public Payment get(String paymentId)
Returns and refresh data of a specific Payment.

Parameters:
paymentId - A Payment with Id.
Returns:
Refreshed instance of the given Payment.

createWithToken

public Payment createWithToken(String token)
Creates a credit card or direct debit Payment from a given token.

Parameters:
token - Token generated by PAYMILL Bridge, which represents a credit card or direct debit.
Returns:
New PAYMILL Payment.

createWithTokenAndClient

public Payment createWithTokenAndClient(String token,
                                        Client client)
Creates a credit card or direct debit Payment from a given token. With the provided Client, the Payment will be created and subsequently be added to the given Client.

Parameters:
token - Token generated by PAYMILL Bridge, which represents a credit card or direct debit.
client - A Client, which is already stored in PAYMILL.
Returns:
New PAYMILL Payment.

createWithTokenAndClient

public Payment createWithTokenAndClient(String token,
                                        String clientId)
Creates a credit card or direct debit Payment from a given token. With the provided Client, the Payment will be created and subsequently be added to the given Client.

Parameters:
token - Token generated by PAYMILL Bridge, which represents a credit card or direct debit.
client - The Id of a Client, which is already stored in PAYMILL.
Returns:
New PAYMILL Payment.

delete

public void delete(Payment payment)
Deletes the specified Payment.

Parameters:
payment - Payment to be deleted.

delete

public void delete(String paymentId)
Deletes the specified Payment.

Parameters:
paymentId - The Id of the Payment to be deleted.
